curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.bind: This item cannot be taken down.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_flesh: Negate all max health bonus. If player maintains at least %s food level for %s minutes, grant +%s%% max health.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_inerti: Negate all other non-tool attack speed bonus. Cap player attack speed to %s. When player attack speed is %s or lower, grant %s%% attack speed bonus.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_metabo: Gain %s%% attack and speed per food level above %s.
Loss %s%% attack, speed, and attack speed per food level below %s.
When food level is full, gain %s%% attack and speed, and negate all speed reduction
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_of_spe: Enchantments on your weapons and armors will put a burden on you, increase damage you take and reduce damage you dealt. Use equipments with high enchantment affinity and gain spell tolerance to mitigate that.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_proxim: Negate all other non-tool attack reach bonus. Cap player attack reach to %s. When player attack reach is %s or lower, grant %s%% attack reach bonus.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_pruden: When you hit a target, your damage to the same target for the next %s second will -%s%% (stackable).
Your damage dealt against a target cannot exceed %s%% of target max health.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.curse_tensio: When you hit a target, place a Terror Token on it. Tokens take %s seconds to mature, then increase your damage to it by %s%% for %s seconds, stacking to at most %s levels.
When a mob deals you a damage higher than %s%% of your current health, all Terror Token from you breaks, and you cannot deal damage to that target for %s seconds
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.reality: When you have at least %s Reality Index:
effect.curseofpandora.prudence.descripti: For render only. Shows if your damage is reduced due to Curse of Prudence effect.
effect.curseofpandora.terror_token.descr: For render only. Shows Mature Terror Token count on target.
effect.curseofpandora.terror_token_pre.d: For Render only. Shows premature Terror Token on target.
effect.curseofpandora.terrorized.descrip: For render only. Shows if you cannot deal damage against this target due to Curse of Tension effect.
item.curseofpandora.bless_of_lava_walker: Allows you to walk on lava
